name: Abel Garcia
bio:
I am a technology-minded professional with experience across IT Management, Application Development, and Public Safety.

I am currently serving as a Law Enforcement Officer in the State of Missouri with an emphasis on Digital Forensics within MacOS, Windows, Linux, and Mobile environments.

bullets: Acted as a regional Task Force Officer with the Northwest Missouri Cyber Crimes Task Force.
Conducted criminal investigations into internet crimes against children across multiple counties.
Conducted digital forensic examinations on mobile devices used in crimes against persons.
Condcuted digital forensic examinations on desktop, laptop, mobile, and various digital and physical storage devices used in crimes against children.
Prepared legal process for the preservation, subpoena, and searches of electronic service provider data.
Maintained accurate and specific documentation and reporting on the examination of evidence and the investigation of criminal activities.
Assisted with local criminal investigations involving a technical component.
Managed web hosting, email, and endpoint (workstation/server) maintenance for SMB clients.
Advised on application and tool implementation, as well as created automation scripts for these tools as needed.
Developed applications and scripts as needed for existing client tools.
Conducted training of personnel as needed for onboarding, taking ownership of all technical support requests and implementations.
Conducted vehiclular and foot patrols of city roadways, parks, and both public and residential properties on twelve hour shifts.
Enforced state statutes and municipal ordinances within the city limits through the issuance of citations and execution of arrests/warrants.
Maintained required certifications and equipment as required by agency leadership.
